00049 /***************************************************************************/
00052 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          1
00053 //There are no any commands at the server side
00054 
00055 /***************************************************************************/
00058 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT        1
00059 //There are no any attributes at the client side
00060 
00061 /***************************************************************************/
00064 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT          0
00065 //There are no any commands at the client side
00066 
00067 //Attribute Ids of Basic Cluster Information
00068 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                          CCPU_TO_LE16(0xfffd)
00069 
00070 //Atribute Ids of Basic Device Information Attribute Set at the server side
00072 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_ZCL_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID               CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000)
00073 
00074 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_APPLICATION_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID       CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001)
00075 
00076 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_STACK_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID             CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0002)
00077 
00078 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_HW_VERSION_ATTRIBUTE_ID                CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003)
00079 
00080 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_MANUFACTURER_NAME_ATTRIBUTE_ID         CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0004)
00081 
00082 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_MODEL_IDENTIFIER_ATTRIBUTE_ID          CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0005)
00083 
00084 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_DATE_CODE_ATTRIBUTE_ID                 CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0006)
00085 
00086 #define ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_POWER_SOURCE_ATTRIBUTE_ID              CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0007)
00087

00208 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes, clcommands)                                                \
00209   {                                                                                                              \
00210     .id = BASIC_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                      \
00211     .options = {.type = ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00212     .attributesAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                              \
00213     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                      \
00214     .commandsAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                  \
00215     .commands = (uint8_t *)clcommands                                                                            \
00216   }
00217 
00218 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER_FLASH(clattributes) ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_SERVER(clattributes)
00219 /***************************************************************************/
00234 #define ZCL_DEFINE_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT(clattributes)                                                                        \
00235   {                                                                                                              \
00236     .id = BASIC_CLUSTER_ID,                                                                                      \
00237     .options = {.type = ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE, .security = ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY},                  \
00238     .attributesAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_ATTRIBUTES_AMOUNT,                                              \
00239     .attributes = (uint8_t *) clattributes,                                                                                          \
00240     .commandsAmount = ZCL_BASIC_CLUSTER_CLIENT_COMMANDS_AMOUNT,                                                  \
00241     .commands = NULL                                                                                             \
00242   }

00296   } hwVersion;
00297

00424 typedef struct PACK

00426   struct PACK
00427   {

00437 // The ResetToFactoryDefaults command is optional now.
00438 /***************************************************************************/
00448 typedef struct PACK
00449 {
00450   struct
00451   {
00452     ZCL_CommandId_t       id;       
00453     ZclCommandOptions_t   options;  
00454 
00459     ZCL_Status_t(*resetToFactoryDefaultsCommand)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t * payload);
00460   } resetToFactoryDefaults;
00461 } ZCL_BasicClusterServerCommands_t;
